Title: The Hammer
Writer: Graham Yost (developed for television by), Fred Golan, Chris Provenzano, Elmore Leonard (based on the short story "Fire in the Hole" by), Wendy Calhoun (executive story editor), Chris Provenzano (executive story editor)
Actors: Timothy Olyphant, Nick Searcy, Joelle Carter, Jacob Pitts
Plot: Fresh out of prison, Boyd Crowder begins his mission to bring "religion" to the backwoods. Meanwhile Raylan starts trying to make a new case against Boyd while working as a bodyguard for a judge whose life has been threatened.
